original_text: At the place where Jesus was crucified, there was a garden, and in the garden a new tomb, in which no one had ever been laid.
korean_text: 예수께서 십자가에 못 박히신 곳에 동산이 있고 동산 안에 아직 사람을 장사한 일이 없는 새 무덤이 있는지라

sentences.original_text: At the place where Jesus was crucified
and in the garden a new tomb
in which no one had ever been laid
sentences.korean_translation: 그 안에는 아직 아무도 장사되지 않았더라
